importation.translation[0].definitions[0: the act of bringing something new or different to a place where it did not previously exist, or something that arrives in this way
restrictions on the importation of American movies
importation.translation[0].definitions[1: the business of bringing things into a country from other countries in order to sell them
a law prohibiting the importation of tuna
importation.translation[1].definitions[0: the activity or process of bringing things into a country from abroad in order to sell them
US law prohibits importation of prison-made goods.
